channel.title: [flame]Why do so many noobs lie about RuneScape?[/flame]
channel.description:
Will someone PLEASE tell me why there are some very sad pricks that lie about their accounts/possesions and levels on RuneScape. If you think your'e ace because your lying about having decent account on a game. Then you should GTFO (O being outside.)
For instance. I was on another forum like this and they had a thread post ur bank screenshots and shit. And you always get loads of fucking noobs saying;
'0h Y34h ! 4M 1337 H4><0r ! h4x3d J@g3><'
To All people that do or have done the above:
Get A Life You Retard

item.title: [flame]Why do so many noobs lie about RuneScape?[/flame]
item.dc:creator: @ryefox2 ryefox2
item.description:
@ryefox2 wrote:

[quote=“anon95490785, post:1, topic:11710”]I know what you mean,

There is this guy I know(irl) who keeps talking like he’s some hacker. He’s like, “Why would you want to cheat in runescape? Just hack it. Since it’s on the website all you need to do is hack the website control panel and change your stats from there, me and my friend did that and went killing everyone!” I just pretend that I belive him(but of course I dont) and maybe someday I’ll just slam it in his face that it’s not true.[/quote]

He did hack them.

I know this guy called Sonny.
He reckons he got 2k blue phats rofl.
He use to privately buy mills off me for $35ea!!!

Read full topic
item.source: [flame]Why do so many noobs lie about RuneScape?[/flame]

item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

This is the genious of the internet, to get sad little people to lie to each other just so they can feel good about themselves… theres no point in lieing about stuff in runescape… Its just some other run of the mill game…

item.title: [flame]Why do so many noobs lie about RuneScape?[/flame]
item.dc:creator: @Alex_Owns Alex Owns
item.description:
@Alex_Owns wrote:

They want to act like someone they are not. Any time a noob calls you a noob, and says they have a level 130 account, they are actually jealous, and envy you to hell.
